title: 1992 Pan Arab Games
text:
The 1992 <a href="Pan%20Arab%20Games">Pan Arab Games</a> was the seventh edition of the quadrennial <a href="multi-sport%20event">multi-sport event</a> between <a href="Arab%20nations">Arab nations</a>. It was held in <a href="Damascus">Damascus</a>, <a href="Syria">Syria</a> between October 4 and September 18, 1992. A total of 2611 athletes from 18 countries participated in events in 14 sports.
The event was greatly affected by the 1991 <a href="Gulf%20War">Gulf War</a>, and several players from many arab countries refused to participate in the Games. Iraq and Libya don't took part to the games.
The football tournament was considered also as a part of the <a href="Arab%20Nations%20Cup">Arab Nations Cup</a>.
